definition: to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: Several captured commandos death, resolutely refused to disclose on the line.
sentences.chinese: 幾個被俘的特戰隊員視死如歸，堅決不肯透露上線。

definition: devotion to righteousness that inspires reverence (idiom)
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
toadying for personal gain/to curry favor/to study in great depth
open the net on one side (idiom); let the caged bird fly/to give one's opponent a way out/lenient treatment
variant of 矇騙|蒙骗[meng1 pian4]
virtue has its rewards (idiom); one good turn deserves another
greedy for life, afraid of death (idiom); craven and cowardly/clinging abjectly to life/only interested in saving one's neck
